events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but my package still hasn't arrived and the tracking hasn't updated in days.
The issue has been categorized under Delivery Delay due to the mention of late shipment and tracking not updating.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the delivery delay inquiry for order #457892.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out. I'm here to help with your delayed order issue and will do my best to resolve it quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and the last update you saw on your tracking information?
My order number is 457892. The last tracking update was five days ago showing it left the warehouse but nothing since then.
We have contacted the shipping provider to check the status, and we're expediting the process to get your package delivered as soon as possible.
Thank you for the update and for acting quickly. I appreciate your help and hope to get my package soon.
The shipping provider updated the delivery status, and your package is now out for delivery today. Please let us know if you experience any further issues.
We just wanted to follow up to make sure your package was received and that everything is satisfactory.
I received my package yesterday, and everything is in perfect condition. Thanks again for your excellent support!
We are closing this case as the delivery issue has been resolved and confirmed by the customer. Thank you for choosing our service.
